review: Chromecast is the best option for those that do not have a smart tv. You can't beat the functionality or the price. You just plug it in, enter your wireless network password, it runs an update and you're done. So easy to set up and use. Google did a great job with this product. I have given this to all my friends that don't have a smart tv and they all love it.
